PT EN

Creating Apps that Rock

  • Som Maior Som Maior’s sales team is now able to present their products to consumers through a digital catalog.
  • upTaxi Getting a cab in Brazil has become much easier, with just a few taps.
  • Casa Brasil Official App of the Casa Brasil 2013 Expo.

At Coderockr we believe the development of applications and systems is an art, that requires passion and dedication.

  • 1

    Web development

    We use PHP, JavaScript, frameworks including Zend Framework, Doctrine, Slim, and build interfaces in HTML5 and CSS3.

  • 2

    Mobile development and design

    We design and develop applications for several platforms including iOS (iPhone, iPad) and Android (smartphones and tablets).

  • 3

    Consulting

    We offer consulting services in web and mobile development, performance and cloud computing.

This is how we roll

    • Opentech Tel & Com app focused on data processing and creation of financial reports

      • Opentech

        For Tel & Com we developed an iPad application that reads the data generated by the Communication Circuits monitoring system and is able to generate a variety of financial and availability reports. The application is distributed internally via the Apple Enterprise Program.

    • iCarros Best solution for researching new and used cars available nearby.

      • iCarros

        iCarros is the best solution for researching new and used cars nearby. Find the best offers in the region, save your favorite ads, and check the prices from the FIPE table. Brazil’s biggest automotive portal is now mobile!

    • arkpad Architecture, decoration and design catalog.

      • arkpad

        With arkpad you can look through the catalog of products and suppliers, search for decorated spaces in a visual library, and create and organize project folders with the application’s content. All content is synchronized with the portal at http://arkpad.com.br.

    • upTaxi Getting a cab in Brazil has become much easier, with just a few taps.

      • upTaxi

        In just a few seconds upTaxi locates, via GPS, the closest taxi from your current location. You can visualize the taxi driver’s information and accept or reject his service. After you accept the driver, you can see in a map the route the taxi is taking. You can also contact the taxi driver directly by calling or sending a message. The application is free and available for iPhones, iPads, and Android smartphones and tablets.

    • Casa Brasil Official App of the Casa Brasil 2013 Expo.

      • Casa Brasil

        Official application of the Casa Brasil 2013 Expo that took place in Bento Gonçalves, RS from August 13th to August 16. The app contains information about attractions and exhibitors. The application is free and available for iPhones, iPads, and Android smartphones and tablets.

    • Som Maior Digital catalog for the company’s sales team.

      • Som Maior

        Digital catalog application for Som Maior’s sales representatives. The catalog has an online administration panel that automatically synchronizes information. The catalog contains brands, lines, categories, and products with images, videos and HTML content. The user is able to share products by email.

    • Indaiá Complete solution for a restaurant including hosting, menu, waiter management and payment methods.

      • Indaiá

        For the Indaiá Restaurant in Itapema, SC we developed a complete menu solution for Android tablets. The menu provides the option of self-service and waiter service, both options use the application to create and manage the orders.
        In addition to the tablet application, we developed the hosting, management, financial and reporting systems.

    • Ultimate Fun Find and listen to your favorite sound memes.

      • Ultimate Fun

        uFun is the most fun way to find and listen to your favorite sound memes. Download it now for iOS or Android and have fun sharing the sounds with your friends.

    • SH Digital catalog containing technical information about all of SH’s products.

      • SH

        Application containing technical information about all SH systems including concrete forming, scaffolding and metal shoring. The app shows the real application of equipment in construction sites through images and 3D videos that show the step-by-step assembly instructions. In addition, the user is able to request quotes through the system.

    • Love or Hate Compatibility test game using mock fingerprint capture.

      • Love or Hate

        Love or Hate is a compatibility test game that uses mock fingerprint capture. Have the two players place their fingers in the indicated areas and a compatibility result will appear. This is a simple but yet fun game to play with your friends. Developed in partnership with Infotech.

  • 2

Clients that Rock with us

Talented programmers are unique, like rock stars!

  • André Espeiorin

    Studied Computer Science and Computer Engineering. Once a mechanic now a developer, he works with LAMP web development since 2006 and iOS and OS X development since 2010. Linux user since 2004 and Mac user since 2009. Almost an ex-musician, he was the vocalist of Skull Crusher from 2004 to 2008. Aficionado of Tolkien and Cornwell and number one advocate of wearing shorts and sneakers in the workplace.

  • Bibi Ferreira

    Coderockr’s office manager, who currently studies Gastronomy but would like to pursue a career in technology. She speaks German, is a fan of Rock and Heavy Metal and loves antique cars. She also enjoys a cold beer and some good old whisky.

  • Darlan Polnow Bassi Junior

    Formado em Técnico de Redes de Computadores e atualmente cursando Design - Animação Digital. É estagiário atuando na área de testes e idéias. Nas horas vagas curte ficar conversando e jogando com os amigos até mais tarde e assistir diversos seriados e sempre que pode da um pulo em Jaraguá para ver os amigos e família. Fã de SOJA e Arctic Monkeys mas tem um estilo de musica bem eclético.

  • Elton Luís Minetto

    Graduated from Unochapecó with a degree in Computer Science and has a post-graduate degree in Computer Science from UFSC/UNOESC. Co-author of “Grid Computing in Research and Education” published by IBM/Redbooks, USA, author of the book “Frameworks para Desenvolvimento em PHP” by Novatec, and author of e-books “Zend Framework na prática” and “Zend Framework 2 na prática.” Works with Linux since 1997, PHP and MySQL since 2000, and Mac OS X since 2007. Programming enthusiast and a great fan of Rock n’ Roll and Heavy Metal.

  • Julia Possamai

    Graduated from The University of Texas at Austin with a degree in Marketing and a degree in Computer Science (Hook’em Horns!). Participated in the “1 Semester Startup” Program at UT Austin, where she acquired valuable knowledge and became increasingly interested in entrepreneurship. Interned at Premiere Radio Networks in New York, worked in Dallas as an Associate Business Systems Analyst and currently works with iOS development. Enjoys meeting new places and cultures. Participated in Cultural Exchange Programs in Washington, DC and Puyallup, WA. Lived in Mexico for 4 years, where she graduated from high school, but still hasn’t learned to enjoy tequila.

  • Mateus Guerra

    Graduated from Unochapecó with a degree in Computer Science and works with Linux, PHP, and MySQL since 2010. Currently works with Zend Framework 2 and Silex and is also familiar with C, C++, JavaScript, HTML/CSS. In his free time, he plays the guitar, is a cartoonist and enjoys playing PS3 games.

  • Pedro Paulo Amorim

    Cursou técnico em Informática e atualmente é estagiário. Trabalha com desenvolvimento Android, também conhece C# e HTML/CSS. Pretende cursar Ciência da Computação. É DJ e produtor musical nas horas vagas, é fã de Pink Floyd e muito Techno. Mas também possui um jeito menos descolado como colecionador de videgames antigos. .

  • Thiago Vieira

    Holds a degree in Graphic Design and also completed a technical program in Data Processing. Works with graphic development since 2005, when he became fascinated with the web. Applies his knowledge in technology and design, is two years focused on interface development for mobile platforms, and especially his attention to detail to improve the user experience. Is a fan of AC/DC, enjoys Rock n’ Roll and as a hobby practices Ballroom dancing.
